title: 256B.0954 CERTAIN PERSONS DEFINED AS MANDATED REPORTERS.
text: Members of the Quality Assurance Commission established under section 256B.0951, members of quality assurance review councils established under section 256B.0952, quality assurance managers appointed under section 256B.0952, and members of quality assurance teams established under section 256B.0952 are mandated reporters as that term is defined in sections 260E.06, subdivision 1, and 626.5572, subdivision 16.
